sourcesContent:
const React = require("react"); class Signup extends React.Component { render() { let message = this.props.message return (

Register an Account Today!

Already have an account? Login here
Homepage

{message}

); } } module.exports = Signup;

const React = require("react"); class Login extends React.Component { render() { let message = this.props.message; return (

Login to Expense Tracker

Create an Account
Homepage

{message}

); } } module.exports = Login;

const React = require("react"); const moment = require("moment"); class Main extends React.Component { render() { let user = this.props.username; let info = this.props.rows; let totalExpense = 0; let totalIncome = 0; let expenseInfo = info.map((info, index) => { info.tempId = index + 1; return info }) let show = expenseInfo.map((info, index) => { let date = moment(info.date).format().substr(0, 10); return {index + 1} {date} {info.type} {info.amount} {info.description} }) let today = moment(new Date()).format().substr(0, 10); info.forEach(infos => { if (infos.type === "expense") { totalExpense += infos.amount } else if (infos.type === "income") { totalIncome += infos.amount } }) return (

Expense Tracker

Welcome {`${user}`}!

Balance: ${totalIncome - totalExpense}

{show}
No. Date Type Amount Description

Add Expenses/Income


Amount:
Date:
Description:
); } } module.exports = Main;

const React = require("react"); const moment = require("moment"); class Single extends React.Component { render() { let index = this.props.index; let info = this.props.rows[index]; let date = moment(info.date).format().substr(0, 10); return (
Date Type Amount Description
{date} {info.type} {info.amount} {info.description}

Amount:
Date:
Description:
) } } module.exports = Single;
